required_daily_outputs: Hold-time vs expectancy curve by mode:strategy (30m, 2h, 6h, 24h, 72h bins).
Exit-reason expectancy table (signal_decay, displacement, expiry_close, premium_target_hit, unknown).
Promotion recommendation: one concrete parameter promotion proposal OR a written refusal with falsification criteria.
Data demands: list any missing artifacts required to run counterfactual exit replays without leakage.
stance: Adversarial. If outputs are not possible, the board must name the missing artifact(s) precisely.
